entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 22.
